singer: 小林明子・永井真理子・麗美・辛島美登里
lyrics: Chestnuts roasting on an open fireJack frost nipping at your noseYule tide carols being sung by a choirAnd folks dressed up like EskimosEverybody knows a turkey and some mistletoeHelp to make the season brightTiny tots with their eyes all a glowWill find it hard to sleep tonightThey know that Santa's on his wayHe's loaded lots of toys and goodies on his sleighAnd every mother's child is gonna spyTo see if reindeer really know how to flySo I'm offering this simple phraseTo kids from one to ninety-twoAlthough it's been said many times many waysMerry Christmas to you
